Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1196.jpg'}
{1: 'Fast City', 2: 'Suburban Villa', 4: '14:30', 5: 'Line Spacing: 2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Iris returns to her room, where letters she retrieved from the mailbox lie spread across her table.'}
{3: 'She pulls out letter paper, casually stacking them before picking up her pen. Elegant royal blue ink flows across the page.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1207.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1207.jpg', 2: '1'}
{1: '—Bane has signed the "The New Earth Codex", ending the successful journey.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: '—By then, the notes will have completely slid to the bottom of the staff, and the distance from the main line with width five will be the optimal length for the slash.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: '—The closed loop will set forth a chain of events, and our sending messages via letters may no longer be viable,', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'You must ensure the viability of the remaining option during your journey.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: '—...', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1196.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1196.jpg', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The flow of ink stops here. Iris hesitates before adding an emotional line.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1207.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1207.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: '<i><color=#0066CC><size=32>—Bane has signed the "The New Earth Codex", ending the successful journey.</size></color><i>', 3: '-535', 4: '350', 9: '3'}

{1: '2', 2: '<i><color=#0066CC><size=32>—By then, the notes will have completely slid to the bottom of the staff, and the distance from the main line with width five will be the optimal length for the slash.</size></color><i>', 3: '0', 4: '200', 9: '3'}

{1: '3', 2: '<i><color=#0066CC><size=32>—The closed loop will set forth a chain of events, and our sending messages via letters may no longer be viable,</size></color><i>', 3: '-325', 4: '50', 9: '3'}
{1: '4', 2: '<i><color=#0066CC><size=32>You must ensure the viability of the remaining option during your journey.</size></color><i>', 3: '-330', 9: '3'}
{1: '—The critical point for the slash is close and must be secured.', 2: '0e70bdff', 3: '0', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 7: '-9', 9: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1196.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1196.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Iris blows the ink dry, slips the letter into an envelope, and stamps it with a wax seal. She lets out a long sigh.'}
{3: 'She pulls out a blank piece of paper, carefully lays it on the desk, and leans back against her chair.'}
{3: 'Her expression softens. The seriousness from earlier—when she spoke of Lueya—and her calm, composed front both begin to disappear.'}
{3: 'Her gaze travels beyond this piece of paper, the room and even the horizon. Suddenly, Iris chuckles softly.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1207.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1207.jpg', 2: '1'}
{1: '<i><color=#0066CC><size=35>—Dear 【kuroname】.</size></color><i>', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1'}
{1: '<i><color=#0066CC><size=35>—How are you? I miss you so much.</size></color><i>', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1', 9: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1196.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1196.jpg', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Her writing flows with tranquility, each stroke soft and tender. Even the air in the room seems to have lightened.'}
{3: 'After a long while, the sound of her pen running on paper ceases as the letter is finally done. Looking at these words, Iris is reading it over and over again.'}
{3: "As if reading it countless times might allow her to hear the recipient's gentle voice replying in her ear."}
{3: 'Finally, Iris makes herself stop, knowing that indulging in such comfort only makes the long journey ahead more difficult.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 4: '4'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront50.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront50.png', 4: '5'}
{3: 'She picks up her violin and the bow dances across the strings.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront51.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront51.png', 4: '5'}
{3: 'As the music fills the air, the letter begins to dance, drawn by an unseen force. It bundles into a tight ball, then unfolds like a germinating seed and grows into a flower.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5301_30.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5301_30.jpg', 4: '5'}
{3: 'A pale blue glow creeps up the paper flower, then vanishes with the last note, as if it were never there at all.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1189.jpg'}
{3: 'Inside the villa, Dandelion sits beside Jonathan with documents spread across the table, patiently explaining everything.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dandelion', 3: 'Due to their troubled history, the people of Bane are particularly sensitive to certain ideas in the "The New Earth Codex".', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Dandelion', 3: "A prime example is the Northern Territory Incident, which had a profound impact on Bane's social climate and public consciousness. If we want to advance the protocol, these sections should...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dandelion', 3: 'Jonathan?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The man has his eyes on the text but his mind is wandering. He snaps the book shut and the loud noise startles Dandelion.'}
{2: 'Dandelion', 3: "Am I making it dry? If you're not interested in this part, we could...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: 'Your eloquence and tone are far more pleasant than the cold legal articles, but...', 4: '2'}
{3: "Jonathan calmly finishes the thought that Dandelion didn't finish."}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: "...I'm sorry, you're right. I'm not interested.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: 'Dandelion, have you ever been to court?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dandelion', 3: "...No, I'm not a lawyer. I'm just a content writer who read some legal documents after learning about my mission.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: "Do you know what lawyers typically do when they get a trial they're going to lose?", 4: '2'}
{3: "Dandelion knows what Jonathan's trying to say and furrows her brow, but realizes she's not in a position to refute him."}
{3: 'So she speaks calmly, her tone more like a plea than a confrontation.'}
{2: 'Dandelion', 3: '...Are you going to run away, Jonathan?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: '...No, I have always faced things head-on in my past.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: "My win rate isn't one hundred percent, not even eighty. I've never cared about the stats. Once I take a case, I see it through to the end, no exceptions.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: "Because I believe my presence is necessary for the court and the case. But in this situation, I'm not a lawyer. I'm not even part of the court.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Jonathan looks at the hem of his clothes. There's a tear from his escape from the Dionysus Theater."}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: "I'm just courtroom evidence to be used against Enora Lueya, who's facing death. I'm just a piece of evidence... one of many.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Jonathan', 3: 'Enora Lueya wants me dead because my death would alter the United Government\'s future direction. Iris wants me alive because I can ensure Bane signs the "The New Earth Codex".', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: "I'm important, but they don't value me. They only care about the agreement.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dandelion', 3: "Iris isn't like that. She's not someone who only cares about results. Otherwise, she... wouldn't have saved me, either.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: '...Perhaps. The Iris you describe does match her words and demeanor.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: "I don't know her past, but her attitude just now... I know it all too well.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dandelion', 3: "I don't get what you mean...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: "She's like a lawyer whose case is approaching its verdict, so she needs to focus on preparing the materials for the court hearing.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: 'Does knowing that mean anything to you, Mr. Jonathan?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Jonathan', 3: "I can't see the full scope of this case. If we lose, the defendant will destroy not only the plaintiff and lawyer, but also the evidence, and even the entire court.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: "But from what she, or what you've told me, I can tell that Enora Lueya follows just two rules: destruction and murder. These alone make up her entire legal code.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: "Disrupting history, mixing up time... What exactly does she want? I can't figure it out, and you don't have the answer.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: 'But no matter how I look at it, I cannot participate in a case with such a lack of transparency and high risk.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dandelion', 3: 'If you give up here... Bane will...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Dandelion presses her lips together, her eyes filled with a silent plea.'}
{3: "Earlier, when Iris mentioned the possibility that the peace operation would include Bane, she glanced at Dandelion, giving Jonathan a clue to Dandelion's identity."}
{3: 'Dandelion is from Bane, which explains why she willingly became involved after Iris saved her.'}
{3: 'But Jonathan is not. Before his identity as a "lawyer," he is more of an "ordinary person."'}
{3: "He places the book on Dandelion's lap, stands up, and takes out his phone, apologizing as he dials a number."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jonathan', 3: "I'm very grateful for your help. If you need any legal consultation in the future, you're welcome to find me—free of charge.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: "If you need money, give me an account number. I'll donate half of my law firm's liquid assets to you—immediately.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: 'But now...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a soft beep, the call connects.'}
{3: 'Jonathan silently mouths to Dandelion—"I should go."'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiLivWarmActivity/FxUiLivWarmActivityVinylBo01.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: "This is the United Government Legal Affairs Department. I'm operator K144. How may I help you?"}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiLivWarmActivity/FxUiLivWarmActivityVinylBo01.prefab'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Jonathan', 3: 'This is Jonathan, a registered lawyer with the United Government Legal Affairs Department. Due to personal reasons, I cannot continue with the current task assigned by the department. Please help me initiate the termination process.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiLivWarmActivity/FxUiLivWarmActivityVinylBo01.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: 'Please wait a moment...'}
{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: 'You are Mr. Jonathan, a consulting advisor for the Legal Affairs Department, correct?'}

{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: 'The system shows you are currently involved in the Bane legal code research project, and will be traveling to Bane with the Legal Affairs Department delegation next week.'}
{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: 'You would like to end this task now, is that correct?'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiLivWarmActivity/FxUiLivWarmActivityVinylBo01.prefab'}
{3: 'Jonathan holds his phone and gives a slight nod after exchanging glances with Dandelion.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiLivWarmActivity/FxUiLivWarmActivityVinylBo01.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: "Understood. I've processed your request. You'll need to complete some additional steps. We will contact you again by phone."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiLivWarmActivity/FxUiLivWarmActivityVinylBo01.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jonathan', 3: 'Thank you for your help.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Jonathan hangs up and avoids Dandelion's gaze, bending down to pack his clothes instead."}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'Footsteps approach as Iris returns to the living room, her wounds now properly treated.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Iris', 3: "Looks like Mr. Jonathan and Dandelion didn't reach an agreement.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jonathan', 3: "This is my fault. I'm selfish. I hope you don't regret saving me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "Nobody should regret saving someone's life, regardless of what happens.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "But running away won't solve anything. As long as you're still in charge, Lueya won't let you go.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: "I've already given up on the task assigned to me by the United Government, though I know it's not right to pass this disaster on to someone else.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Jonathan's hands freeze as he buttons his sleeve."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jonathan', 3: "But I'm innocent too.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "You're missing my point. If things could be changed so easily, Lueya and I wouldn't be at this standoff right now.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Iris glances at the phone Jonathan still clutches in his hand.'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "The world has inertia. It naturally stays on its established path. It's change that comes with a price.", 4: '1'}
{3: "As if to validate Iris's words, Jonathan's phone rings."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiLivWarmActivity/FxUiLivWarmActivityVinylBo01.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: 'Jo, are you in trouble?'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiLivWarmActivity/FxUiLivWarmActivityVinylBo01.prefab'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: 'I ran into something at the Dionysus Theater...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Jonathan looks up at the two.'}
{2: 'Jonathan', 3: 'We were attacked by an armed organization. Their resolve to stop Bane from signing the "The New Earth Codex" is far beyond what we imagined.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiLivWarmActivity/FxUiLivWarmActivityVinylBo01.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: '...Jo, I know how hard this is for you, but someone has to finish this.'}
{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: 'The "The New Earth Codex" is a massive undertaking. The Legal Affairs Office of the United Government has no other option left. Even I am already on a plane.'}
{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: "I won't appeal to some grand cause to persuade you, but... the world is changing. Once you're caught up in it, it's difficult to walk away."}
{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: 'You\'ve been a member of the United Government for so long and part of their "peacekeeping operations." Aren\'t you familiar with their methods by now?'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiLivWarmActivity/FxUiLivWarmActivityVinylBo01.prefab'}
{1: '1', 3: "Jonathan's face instantly darkens."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiLivWarmActivity/FxUiLivWarmActivityVinylBo01.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: "Think it over again, Jo. It's not just for others, it's also for yourself."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiLivWarmActivity/FxUiLivWarmActivityVinylBo01.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jonathan', 3: 'Thank you for your reminder...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Jonathan abruptly ends the call.'}
{3: "Before he can even process his emotions, his phone lights up again. It's a text message from the United Government."}
{3: 'Each word hides a threat behind respect.'}
{3: 'Iris sighs. Before she can speak, a knock at the door breaks the silence.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Postman', 3: 'Hello, this is Unit 6? Which one of you is Iris? I have something for you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Iris takes the envelope and the familiar texture sends a wave of unease through her.'}
{3: 'The blue handwriting appears steady, but the hurried strokes between the lines reveal it was written in haste.'}

{1: '<i><color=#0066CC><size=35>—The Multilateral Trade Agreement happening at Mirror Sea Twin Towers has been postponed due to an unknown attack. Witnesses reported a metal giant, which some experts claim to be a secret military weapon.</size></color><i>', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: '<i><color=#0066CC><size=35>—The Mantaine coastline peace operation of the Tuka Independent Guard has encountered significant resistance. Unknown attackers are throwing the situation into chaos.</size></color><i>', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: '<i><color=#0066CC><size=35>—The 709th Mechanized Brigade of the United Government has entered the Roro Rainforest in accordance with the joint security regulations in the "The New Earth Codex" - Roro and United Government Section.</size></color><i>', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: '<i><color=#0066CC><size=35>During the deployment, they were attacked by an unidentified armed organization and suffered heavy casualties. No one has claimed responsibility for the incident.</size></color><i>', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: '<i><color=#0066CC><size=35>—Lueya has realized the critical point for slash is approaching. She has launched attacks against various nodes and is attempting to break free.</size></color><i>', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1189.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1189.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dandelion', 3: "Iris? What's wrong? You look terrible...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "She's found the loophole... She's fighting back...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dandelion', 3: 'Who?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The ground trembles for a second before Dandelion can finish. Iris turns her head, her mechanical pupils start adjusting, and she sees something in the distance.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Iris', 3: "Enora Lueya, she's here.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory936.png'}
{1: 'Babylonia', 2: 'District Information Center Server Room', 4: '7:00', 5: 'Line Spacing: 0'}
{3: 'The next day, you follow a message on your terminal and arrive at the Information Center in the same district as the Dormitory.'}
{3: 'The usually bustling building is now temporarily closed. The few people who come up click their tongues in disappointment and walk away.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Good morning, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: "What's going on here?", 3: '304'}
{3: 'You walk into the building with Ayla after going around the barriers.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Last night, the forensics department ran three thorough tests on your letter. They did not find anything.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "As for the painting—our last clue. It gave leads that are too vague, so they've decided to involve information technology specialists.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why all the fuss for some specialists?', 3: '309'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "It's not the specialists, but the solution they're working on...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla blinks, takes out her terminal, and taps it a few times before reciting the text.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: '"We\'ve decided to abstract your painting into different conceptual data sets based on three disciplines: art, medicine, and forensic analysis."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: '"These conceptual data sets will then be transformed into various keywords used in a search throughout Babylonia to find matching content."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is there a version of that in plain language?', 3: '318'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I'd like one too.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory584.jpg', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As she finishes speaking, the terminal chimes and auto-connects before she can touch it.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "The plain version is: we're digitizing the painting to figure out why it made you both uncomfortable, and to see if anyone else reacts to it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "The search scope is huge, and filtering the scattered data is complicated, so we've booked this place as our temporary workspace. Also...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The voice goes quiet for a moment. A heavy breathing sound follows, as if the speaker is leaning closer.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'You both came without breakfast?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory584.jpg'}
{3: "You enter the Information Center's server room and see rows of wide monitors lining the walls. Data cascades down the screens like waterfalls, while subtle beeps hum rhythmically."}
{1: '1', 3: 'At the control console, a petite figure is curled up in an oversized chair with a vacant stare.'}
{3: "She looks more like an employee who's pulled an all-nighter, rather than a Construct."}
{2: 'How are you feeling?', 3: '351'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Horrible.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Teddy rolls her eyes. All-nighters might be nothing new, but staring at endless streams of data is clearly more tiring than playing "Ultimate Bear Brawl" in her dormitory.'}
{3: 'A rhythmic, melodic notification chimes in harmony with your terminal alerts.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiLivWarmActivity/FxUiLivWarmActivityVinylBo01.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Electronic Voice', 3: 'Your order of two cherry-flavored electrolyte drinks and one cherry-flavored milk tea has been accepted. The vendor is preparing your order.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiLivWarmActivity/FxUiLivWarmActivityVinylBo01.prefab'}
{2: "...There's no need to hack into my terminal. I could have ordered for you.", 3: '360'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Because it makes me look more professional, plus it helps me blow off steam!', 4: '1'}
{2: '...Whatever works for you.', 3: '363'}
{2: 'Have you reached any conclusions?', 3: '364'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "My only conclusion is that there's something odd about what happened to you. We don't have enough information to form a theory.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her fingers fly across the controls as she pulls up a user-friendly interface. A dozen files pop up in succession across the monitors.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "First of all, the painting. I searched Babylonia's entire internal network, but there's no picture with more than 60% similarity. I also checked the ones with less similarity. No need to waste any words for that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I can't get more information because the portrait lacks facial features. That's usually the easiest characteristic to match, essentially serving as the key data.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Because I haven't decided how to draw it yet...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The cursor traces "whatever" across the screen in response.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I also have people's reactions to this painting from over 280 individuals across 66 industries and 4 age groups, using both indirect questionnaires and direct interviews.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'The data from this was the only result I got last night.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What do you mean?', 3: '381'}

{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Certain age groups showed reactions beyond typical observations. The reactions weren't obvious—often just casual comments or remarks—but they became significant once the sample size increased.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I've divided these individuals into two distinct groups based on their reactions.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Teddy glances at Ayla as she continues to speak.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'The first group shares an obvious trait: affiliation with the WGAA. Allen and certain other WGAA members, for example.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "But the second group didn't. There were no common traits in terms of social status, purchasing power, living location, or recent experiences.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'I spent the entire night digging and eventually found something. The result is fascinating.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Teddy pulls up a column of data, labeled ticket purchase records.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'They all attended an old opera that was recently restaged: "The Acadia Evacuation". Almost all of them were present at its premiere.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I've already reported these findings to Asimov. He'll find resources to conduct a thorough interview of these individuals.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Don't forget. I'm keeping a record, and I'll send it to your terminal with daily reminders.", 4: '1'}
{2: "...I'll update my firewall as soon as I get home.", 3: '396'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I've already updated it. I'm in charge of this quarter's version, and it hasn't even been synced to the Information Technology Center yet.{226|153|170}", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'By the way... is that the image analysis software on screen?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Ayla interrupts the playful banter.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Yes, it is. Do you want to search for images with less than sixty percent similarity?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "No. Didn't you just say there were no matches?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Then what's this...?", 4: '2'}
{3: "You all fix your gaze on the screen where Ayla's finger is."}
{3: 'On the bottom of the screen, on a red bar that shows an error that has self-repaired, one result stands out.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTheatre3/FxUiTheatre3PlayMainScreenRedEx.prefab', 2: '3'}

{3: 'Teddy furrows her brow, and a dizzying array of windows pop up on the screen.'}
{3: 'Soon, more information appears.'}

{2: 'A Babylonia backup frame, stored in... a conservation area warehouse?', 3: '448'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "...I think we've found the issue.", 4: '1'}
{2: "We have three hours until it's destroyed. Let's head to the warehouse now.", 3: '451'}

{2: 'Teddy', 3: "—Temporary communication channel established. I've created a combat mission under the Science Council's dispatch authority. I'll assist you in accessing Conservation Area 221's surveillance systems.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'As for Ishmael...', 3: '453'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I'll use the Science Council's authority to block her surface access request and stop Ishmael from reaching Conservation Area 221 before you do—I'm on my way to her now.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You quickly assess your plan and leave Babylonia without gathering combat supplies.'}
